title: Thursday Night Debate Breakdown: Noam Chomsky vs. Alan Dershowitz (2005)
description:
Rob Larson, Matthew Vernon Whalan and Producer Jordan join Ben Burgis to continue the weekly serious of Thursday Night Debate Breakdowns by watching Noam Chomsky's 2005 debate on peace in Israel/Palestine with Alan Dershowitz--should be a fun followup on the one last week where we watched Dershowitz's 2003 demolition by Norm Finkelstein.
